publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1882 John Scott: Glasgow Prestwick International Airport - Best Cargo Airportâ€”That the Parliament applauds Glasgow Prestwick International Airport on being named Best Cargo Airport at the 25th Air Cargo News Awards; notes that the airport handles on average 20 Boeing 747 freighters each week and continues to improve its freight development month on month, and commends the management and workforce of Glasgow Prestwick International Airport for their efforts which have resulted in this award.
S3M-1882 Glasgow Prestwick International Airport - Best Cargo Airport (lodged on 9 May 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1882 Glasgow Prestwick International Airport - Best Cargo Airport (lodged on 9 May 2008) Irene Oldfather*
